custom-action.name: buildwhiteblocknetwork
custom-action.description:
Build a BlockChain Network.
Possible parameters are: - WhiteBlocMasterHost (required): Master Node of your Whiteblock Network Default value is "Host of the master Node ". - TypeofBlochacin (required): value possible :Ethereum, Syscoin, Rchain, EOS, Monero, NEM, Fabric, Quorum, or Custom Default value is "Type of BlockChain Network". - NumberOfNodes (required): Number of nodes to generate in the network Default value is "Number of Nodes".
